name: I AM BALL (itch)
description:
The Game Is Awesome. You Are a Ball  with DANGEROUS ENEMIES In Your Sourroundings. Use Your DASH ABILITY to KILL THEM! . You Can Also FLY USING YOUR JETPACK BUT CARE ABOUT YOUR FUEL.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FEATURES :

YOU CAN CUSTOMISE YOUR PLAYER!

UPGRADES ARE ALSO AVALIBLE!

MAKE HIGHSCORES!

COOL GRAPHICS!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

TOOLS USED:

UNITY GAME ENGINE.

VS COMMUNITY 2019.

MICROSOFT POWER POINT 2019.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

MAY YOU HAVE FUN:)
